properties.areaDesc: Christian, MO; Webster, MO; Douglas, MO; Wright, MO
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 6:11AM CST until January 18 at 8:30AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
At 608 AM CST, reporting gauges indicated flooding across the warned
area. Up to one and a half inches of widespread rain fell across the
warned area. While no additional rainfall is expected, residual
flooding of low water crossings and low lying roadways will continue
through much of today.

Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the warning include...
Marshfield...                     Mountain Grove...
Rogersville...                    Ava...
Seymour...                        Mansfield...
Fordland...                       Dawson...
Norwood...                        Hartville...
Niangua...                        Duncan...
Diggins...                        Elkland...
Oldfield...                       Manes...
Brushyknob...                     Elkhead...
Grovespring...                    Rome...

This warning includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Route EE at the North Fork River south of Cabool...
Route FF at Hunter Creek east of Ava...
Route Y at Cowskin Creek west of Ava...
Greenwood Road at The Pomme de Terre River...
Route AB at Wolf Creek northeast of Mansfield...
Route Z at Elk Creek north of Hartville...
and Route U at at Bryant Creek northeast of Ava.
properties.instruction:
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are
potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded
roads. Find an alternate route.

NWSheadline: A FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CST FOR WEBSTER... DOUGLAS...WRIGHT AND EASTERN CHRISTIAN COUNTIES
